filmography.title: Cimarron
filmography.role_description: A determined pioneer wife who evolves from a timid girl into a congresswoman while settling the Oklahoma Territory.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Oscar: Win – Best Picture

filmography.title: Back Street
filmography.role_description: A woman who sacrifices her own happiness to live as the mistress of a married man she loves deeply.
filmography.plot: A woman loves a man who is married to someone else, living in the shadows as his mistress for decades.

filmography.title: Thirteen Women
filmography.role_description: A wealthy sorority alumna who becomes the target of a vengeful former classmate using astrology to manipulate events.
filmography.plot: A woman manipulates a swami into sending death threats to twelve other women from her sorority.

filmography.title: Ann Vickers
filmography.role_description: A social reformer and prison warden who struggles to balance her career with a complicated love life.
filmography.plot: A social worker fights for prison reform while dealing with her own romantic entanglements.

filmography.title: The Age of Innocence
filmography.role_description: A scandalous countess returning to 1870s New York society who wins the heart of her cousin's fiancé.
filmography.plot: A man engaged to a proper society girl falls in love with her unconventional cousin.

filmography.title: Sweet Adeline
filmography.role_description: A singer in her father's beer garden who rises to Broadway fame while navigating romantic misunderstandings.
filmography.plot: A waitress with a beautiful voice becomes a Broadway star in the 1890s.

filmography.title: Roberta
filmography.role_description: An exiled Russian princess working as a head designer in a Parisian fashion house who falls for an American football player.
filmography.plot: A football player inherits a Paris fashion house and decides to run it with the help of his bandleader friend.

filmography.title: Magnificent Obsession
filmography.role_description: A widow blinded by an accident who becomes the inspiration for a playboy's transformation into a selfless surgeon.
filmography.plot: A reckless playboy is responsible for the death of a doctor and the blindness of his widow, leading him to seek redemption.

filmography.title: Show Boat
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a show boat captain who rises to stardom but faces a turbulent marriage to a riverboat gambler.
filmography.plot: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their life together is fraught with difficulty.

filmography.title: The Theodora Goes Wild
filmography.role_description: A small-town Sunday school teacher who secretly writes racy novels and unleashes her wild side to win a man.
filmography.plot: A straight-laced woman writes a scandalous bestseller under a pseudonym and tries to hide her identity.

filmography.title: The Awful Truth
filmography.role_description: A quick-witted socialite who engages in a hilarious battle of sabotage with her soon-to-be ex-husband to stop him from remarrying.
filmography.plot: A married couple files for divorce, but before their decree becomes final, they do their best to ruin each other's plans for remarriage.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Oscar: Win – Best Director

filmography.title: High, Wide, and Handsome
filmography.role_description: A singer who marries a farmer and helps him battle railroad tycoons to build an oil pipeline.
filmography.plot: A musical set in 1859 Pennsylvania, chronicling the early days of the oil industry and a romance between a farmer and a singer.

filmography.title: Joy of Living
filmography.role_description: A successful Broadway star exploited by her leeching family who learns how to enjoy life from a carefree boat owner.
filmography.plot: A Broadway star is tired of her family living off her earnings, until she meets a man who teaches her how to relax.

filmography.title: Love Affair
filmography.role_description: A singer who falls in love with a playboy on a cruise, but tragedy strikes before they can reunite at the Empire State Building.
filmography.plot: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship, but a tragic accident threatens their reunion.

filmography.title: Invitation to Happiness
filmography.role_description: A wealthy woman who marries a prizefighter and struggles with the distance his career creates in their marriage.
filmography.plot: An aristocratic woman marries a heavyweight boxer, but their different worlds cause friction in their marriage.

filmography.title: My Favorite Wife
filmography.role_description: A woman declared dead after being shipwrecked who returns home on the day her husband is marrying another woman.
filmography.plot: A woman who has been missing for seven years and declared legally dead returns home on the day her husband is marrying another woman.

filmography.title: Penny Serenade
filmography.role_description: A woman who reflects on her courtship, marriage, and the heartbreaking challenges of adoption and raising a child.
filmography.plot: A couple looks back on their past as they prepare to go their separate ways, recalling their courtship, marriage, and the death of their child.

filmography.title: Unfinished Business
filmography.role_description: A small-town girl who marries the brother of the man she really loves in a rebound romance.
filmography.plot: A woman marries a man on the rebound after being rejected by his brother, leading to a complicated love triangle.

filmography.title: A Guy Named Joe
filmography.role_description: A female pilot in WWII who mourns her deceased lover and is unknowingly guided by his spirit to find new love.
filmography.plot: A pilot kills himself in a crash and returns as a guardian angel to guide a young pilot through the war and in love.

filmography.title: The White Cliffs of Dover
filmography.role_description: An American woman who marries an English aristocrat and experiences two World Wars from her new home in Britain.
filmography.plot: An American woman marries into British nobility and endures the hardships of both World Wars.

filmography.title: Together Again
filmography.role_description: A widow and town mayor who finds unexpected romance with a sculptor hired to create a statue of her late husband.
filmography.plot: A female mayor of a small town falls for a sculptor she hires to make a statue of her late husband.

filmography.title: Anna and the King of Siam
filmography.role_description: A strong-willed British governess who travels to Siam to teach the King's children and challenges the King's traditions.
filmography.plot: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Cinematography; Oscar: Win – Best Art Direction

filmography.title: Life with Father
filmography.role_description: The clever and gentle wife who deftly manages her bombastic and demanding Victorian husband.
filmography.plot: A bombastic father strives to run his household with the efficiency of his office, but is usually outwitted by his wife and children.

filmography.title: I Remember Mama
filmography.role_description: The warm, resourceful matriarch of a Norwegian immigrant family in San Francisco, holding the family together with love.
filmography.plot: A writer recalls her childhood in San Francisco as the daughter of Norwegian immigrants.

filmography.title: The Mudlark
filmography.role_description: A grieving, reclusive Queen Victoria who is charmed out of her seclusion by a young street urchin.
filmography.plot: A street urchin sneaks into Windsor Castle to catch a glimpse of Queen Victoria, inadvertently helping her end her mourning.

filmography.title: It Grows on Trees
filmography.role_description: A housewife who discovers trees in her backyard that grow money, causing chaos for her family and the government; Dunne's final film.
filmography.plot: A family discovers two trees in their backyard that grow money, leading to complications with the Treasury Department.
